title: Humility
verses: James 4:6 (WEB) — “God resists the proud, but gives grace to the humble.”
1 Peter 5:6 (WEB) — “Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God.”
Philippians 2:3–5 (WEB) — “In humility, consider others better than yourselves… have this mind in you which was also in Christ Jesus.”
Proverbs 22:4 (WEB) — “The result of humility and the fear of Yahweh is wealth, honor, and life.”
body: Humility is truth about God and ourselves—receiving grace, serving others, and yielding our rights for love. Jesus is our model and motive.
prayer: Humble King, clothe me with humility. Free me from self-importance and form in me the mind of Christ. Amen.
